data.title: Alex's Lemonade Stand Foundation for Childhood Cancer
data.meta_description: Everything that Alex's Lemonade Stand Foundation does to help kids with cancer - from funding breakthrough research to providing critical support programs - starts with supporters like you. data.meta_site_name: Alex's Lemonade Stand Foundation for Childhood Cancer
data.text:
Everything that Alex's Lemonade Stand Foundation does to help kids with cancer - from funding breakthrough research to providing critical support programs - starts with supporters like you. Our commitment to transparency and efficiency means we use your funds wisely and have the greatest impact on childhood cancer.

ALSF Charitable Tax ID: 56-2496146

Download Form W-9

2023 Annual Report

Download the Report

ALSF has received top ratings from Charity Navigator, GuideStar and America's Best Charities based on effectiveness, accountability and transparency.
